::Slayer::

Slayer is hit by one shot from the Trainer base, cursing to himself. 
He was a friggin' member of the Trainers, and the base was firing at 
him! He knew why, but he was still a bit ticked at it.

Flying back, Slayer aims his shoulder blasters and fires several 
shots at Hellpeon.
